name: Shinobi Unleashed
description: You are a chi shinobi, you control the air around your body and use it to perform acrobatic feats and devastating assaults.This is a 2d side scroller game that me and 2 other people are currently working on. It's in version 0.2 at the moment however it is playable and many of the core mechanics are there.Feel free to download and play it for free, I'll be trying to keep it up to date as much as possible as development progresses. Enjoy! :)
